name: eggd_optimised_filtering
title: eggd_optimised_filtering
summary: Create VCF with additional annotations required for optimised filtering from a VEP annotated VCF
whatsNew: * v1.1.0 Initial working version which takes a VCF and adds optimised filtering annotations

inputSpec.name: vcf
inputSpec.label: VEP annotated vcf
inputSpec.help: VCF file which has been annotated by VEP

inputSpec.name: config
inputSpec.label: Config file
inputSpec.help: Config file with filtering parameters such as AF thresholds and bcftools filter string

inputSpec.name: panel_string
inputSpec.label: Panel string
inputSpec.help: Clinical indication string for the panel(s) being tested for

inputSpec.name: panelapp_file
inputSpec.label: PanelApp file
inputSpec.help: JSON file containing information for all panels from PanelApp

inputSpec.name: genepanels_file
inputSpec.label: Genepanels file
inputSpec.help: genepanels tsv file including PanelApp panel ID for each panel

outputSpec.name: output_vcf
outputSpec.label: Output VCF
outputSpec.help: VCF with additional INFO fields based on optimised filtering parameters
